entity.name: Socceroos defeat Vietnam 1-0 in World Cup qualifier
entity.description: The Socceroos extended their winning streak to ten consecutive games after defeating Vietnam 1-0 in their bid to qualify for the 2022 World Cup. Defender Rhyan Grant scored his first international goal late in the first half to secure the win. Australia’s next game is against Oman on October 7.
